name: T - Emma Emily
_source: speak;Emily; Oh I'm in for it now.{w} Here comes the lecture...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; I WAS SO WORRIED ABOUT YOU!!!
speak;Emily; I know I worried you, Em,{w} but I couldn't just leave those people to die like that{tgm}... You know I can't just sit by and watch bad things happen.

speak;Emma; Who do you think you're saving by sacrificing yourself?!{w} Emily, you're my little sister.{w} The only person I have who I can say I share blood with.{w} If I lose you, then who am I going to see the stars with?{w} You think the last memory I want of my sister is{tgm}...{tgm} is watching her charge into the point of a spear?
speak;Emily; I-I never thought of it that way{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I'm sorry, Em{tgm}...
speak;Emily; *sniffle*{w} I-I-I didn't mean to make you feel like that{tgm}...

speak;Emma; Let's just focus on fighting our way through the village.{w} But Emily, remember this{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Next time you charge in by yourself{tgm}...{tgm}{w} You. Will. Feel. My. Magic.{w} You understand me?
speak;Emily; You don't have to tell me twice!
speak;Emily; Oh gosh, I might've dodged an arrow there...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
